metadata.synopsis: One-liner all patrolling Flaming Fist from squads with Steel Watchers
metadata.how_to_trigger: larian://bookmark?mod=GustavDev&level=CTY_Main_A&camPos=70.176254;50.521202;-34.340195&camTarget=69.400658;49.917858;-34.154663One of patrols is at above link.

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *The guard is busy with their patrol and has no time for idle chatter.*

1.speaker: Narrator
1.text: *Since the death of Gortash, the Flaming Fists seem as tense as cocked crossbows. It wouldn't take much to set them off.*
